RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 45000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Clai m Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARBON coaxed from the gate, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong taking command in the final jumps to the finish to prevail. OUR ROSIE DIAMONDS coaxed from the start, led early on four paths off the inside before being displaced on the front by AERON WARRIOR five furlongs from home, prompted that rival to the outside before advancing to take back the front near the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under challenge from flanking rivals a furlong out, rebuffed the inside foe while collared in the final jumps to the finish from the outside rival and was along for the place honors. HARLAN'S BOND chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch forcing AERON WARRIOR to pause briefly in behind, offered up a bid to issue a challenge inside the leader a furlong out but was ultimately repelled in the late stages. SUSIE'S SAVER seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four then three wide through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors. HANDLE THE TRUTH bobbled at the start, chased three wide down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. SWEET SENSATION stumbled at the start recovering inwards and conceded six to seven lengths to the front, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. AERON WARRIOR broke out at the start, chased just off the inside before advancing to take command five furlongs from home, tucked inside through the turn and came under pressure getting displaced from the front just outside the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch pausing behind HARLAN'S BOND straightened away, then weakened to the finish. JOEY THE FISH broke a beat slow, then got steadied at the start conceding eight to nine lengths to the front before settling into an awkward stride, chased three then two wide detached at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went five to six wide into upper stretch, drifted out under left handed crop, then drifted in under a right handed crop and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5w backstretch, 3w turn, 3-4w upper, up final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Aeron Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, advanced 2p, up 5/8, headed ins turn, ins 1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Handle the Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3w, coaxed ins 3/8, 4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Joey the Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, steady st, chased 3-2w, 5-6w upper, drifted stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Harlan's Bond
ENTRY.OWNER: Carney Sean Donk David G and Mackay Douglas R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, bid, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Our Rosie Diamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, led early 4w, prompted, up 3/8, 2-3w upper, caught lte

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4-3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisabl e to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRICKY TEMPER broke a bit slow and spotted the front a few lengths, angled out while hustled then chased the pace on the outside, went four wide on the turn, gained in the five path into the stretch, took over under one pop of a left-handed crop inside the three-sixteenths, disposed of two foes into the final furlong and drew away under a solid hand-ride ride to prove much the best. MY KINDA MISCHIEF was recalcitrant and reluctant to load while being backed in from the front of the gate, came away in good order, tracked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the turn, made a bid in upper stretch and safely secured the place while no match for the winner. RED BURGUNDY was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied in the two path on the turn, moved closer to the rail coming to the quarter-pole, lost the advantage under a drive inside the three-sixteenths, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened but held the show. CALL HER BLUFF hit the inside of the gate and was off slow, spotted the front several lengths, was coaxed along at the rear, moved from the three to four path early on the turn, gained some while making a brief run late on that bend, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. DORTH'S SOL DANCER was hustled from the start then coaxed along off the pace, came under stronger encouragement in the two path on the turn, remained on her inside lead in the stretch and lacked the needed response. PLAY FREE BIRD was hustled from the start, chased the pace on the inside, dropped back late on the turn and reteated.

ENTRY.NAME: Play Free Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,chased inside,dropped back 5/16,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Tricky Temper
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,angled out,chsd out,4p turn,5p1/4,lead ins3/16,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Dorth's Sol Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,coaxed along,2path turn,inside lead,lackd needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Red Burgundy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,showed way,2path turn,ins1/4,headed ins3/16,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: My Kinda Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load,backd in gate,away well,out,3p,bid3/16,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Call Her Bluff
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,off slow,coaxed at rear,3-4w turn,5w into lane,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 106. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 156000. INNER TURF (PURSE $120,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $27,144 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE O F $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare As sessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSIC CATCH bumped at the start by MOLIERE, raced three wide through the first turn before chasing four paths off the inside down the backstretch, advanced on the leader in tandem with COSTA TERRA and took over command near the three-eighths and quickly opened up in tandem with that rival on the rest of the field, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in dueling through the stretch to the finish in game fashion putting a head in front a sixteenth out and holding that advantage to the wire. COSTA TERRA tossed his head at the start and came inwards bumping and pinching OUSTER against ROYAL TRYST, raced four then three wide through the first turn before chasing five paths off the inside down the backstretch and through the far turn advancing to knock heads with the aforementioned foe from three furlongs out, swung four wide into upper stretch taking narrow advantage, dug in dueling through to the wire getting headed a sixteenth out and gamely fought on to the end but was ultimately bested at the finish. OUSTER got bumped at the start by COSTA TERRA and was pinched back against ROYAL TRYST, chased just off the inside and then along the inside through the opening bend and down the backstretch, went three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and weakened. ROYAL TRYST chased five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and tired. TRIDENT HIT showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside into the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, got headed near the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch in retreat and faltered in the drive. MOLIERE broke out at the start bumping CLASSIC CATCH, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide for home and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Moliere
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Catch
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 3w 1st turn, chased 4w, up 3/8, 3w uppr, dueled, game

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Tryst
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 7/16, angled 5-6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ouster
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, pinched st, chased ins, coaxed 3w 7/16, 5w uppr, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Costa Terra
ENTRY.COMMENT: toss head st, 4-3w 1st turn, chased 5w, 4w upper, dueled, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Trident Hit
ENTRY.OWNER: Floyd Sagely Properties LTD and Johnston Keith F
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 7/16, yielded ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JODY'S PRIDE pressed the pace of MIA MARCELA from the outside in the three path, advanced to duel with that rival midway on the turn and took over a narrow advantage near the five-sixteenths, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, went clear under a drive to prevail. MIA MARCELA coaxed from the start, established the front shortly after the break and showed the way lightly coaxed along in the two path under pressure from JODY'S PRIDE to the outside, dueled with that rival midway on the turn and was headed for the front with five-sixteenths to go, cut the corner into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. SOLVE THE PUZZLE hustled from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, improved position to secure the show honors. LYRICAL PARDON hustled from the start, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, continued two to three wide for home and weakened. SUGAR N SPICE coaxed from the gate, chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, tired. TAP THE KEG leapt up at the start and then outwards getting away last and conceding three lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Tap the Keg
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Pavilion Racing and Twin Sports Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: leapt up st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lyrical Pardon
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 2-3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Marcela
ENTRY.OWNER: Heiligbrodt L William Heiligbrodt Corinne Brewster Clark O Jackpot Farm and Whis
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, lightly coaxed 2p, headed 5/16, cut corner, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Jody's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3p, up near 5/16, set down 2w 1/4p, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar N Spice
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Solve the Puzzle
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, improved

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of ASC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 45000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLUBHOUSE leaned out at the start but broke towards the front, pressed the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the three path on the turn, took the advantage in upper stretch and drew away while kept to the task under a solid hand-ride. TOMMY GUN broke in then was corrected by the rider and hustled, moved in while showing the way, came in then shut-off and bumped MODERN MIDAS near the five-eighths pole which caused that opponent to check, vied between foes in the two path under urging on the turn, lost the advantage to the winner in upper stretch and proved no match while clear for the place. PRESSURE moved out early, settled just off the pace, was roused four wide on the turn, chased into upper stretch and weakened while clear for the show. MODERN MIDAS veered in sharply at the start then bumped with a foe, was grabbed with the right-rein and corrected under a long hold, moved up while hustled, was shut-off by TOMMY GUN near the five-eighths and bumped by that foe then checked, came back under strong encouragement while pushed up inside the aforementioned foe, vied inside of two horses while along the rail on the turn, dropped back outside the quarter-pole and tired. BASIS RISK broke awkwardly and was off a bit slow then was forced in and checked, spotted the front many lengths, went two to three wide on the turn and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Basis Risk
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward brk,bit slow,forced in,checked,2-3p turn,trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Modern Midas
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer in brk,bmp foe,corrected,mvd up,bmpd 5/8,checked,ins,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pressure
ENTRY.OWNER: Baccari Racing Stable LLC and Prince Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out,just off pace,asked 4path turn,chased,tired,clear 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Tommy Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,hustled,pace,came in 5/8,bmpd foe,2p turn,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Clubhouse
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrell Ventures LLC and Starlight Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: press outside,3p turn,roused1/4,lead3/16,clear,kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE O F $50,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise ClaimW ill Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO HAPPINESS broke out at the start, then was devoid of speed when settling at the tail of the filed just off the inside early on before tipping six paths off the rail down the backstretch, chased six then five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, closed well to issue a challenge through the final furlong stacking outside a trio and was just up in the shadow of the wire to score. COPPA GIRL chased four to five paths off the inside early on, tucked to the two path five furlongs from home before heading four wide into the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive loosely between foes taking narrow command a sixteenth out, then got nailed on the line and forced to settle for the place honors. SHEZZ KOLDAZICE four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the show honors. RAGING SEA got bumped between foes at the start, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive under threat from a trio clinging to command until overwhelmed a sixteenth out, kept on to the finish well clear of the rest. VIENNA CODE forwardly placed four wide early on, chased four then three wide before tucking to the two path placed to coaxing at the half mile pole, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and weakened. IN MY OPINION broke out at the start bumping RAGING SEA in tandem with FANCY AZTECA, chased along the inside under coaxing from the half mile pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. FANCY AZTECA broke in at the start bumping RAGING SEA in concert with IN MY OPINION, then got bumped between foes herself and was briefly just off the inside before tipping out to be five paths off the rail into the backstretch taking shortened awkward strides, began to climb nearing the three-quarter pole in the absence of any kickback and was placed to a protective hold when striding awkward, got guided outside and was pulled up and subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Into Happiness
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 6-5w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w uppr, closed well, up

ENTRY.NAME: In My Opinion
ENTRY.OWNER: A P Stable and Fox Tale Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 1/2p, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped betw st, in hand 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 3w uppr, caught 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Fancy Azteca
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Casal Jorge Kahn Alan and Carney Christopher L
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump btw after st, 5w briefly, protected, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Shezz Koldazice
ENTRY.OWNER: Sturgeon Bobby T and GenStar Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Coppa Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w early, to 2p 5/8, coaxed 4w 3/8, 5w upper, up 1/16, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Vienna Code
ENTRY.OWNER: Williams Andrew O and Inniss Lenox
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w early, chased 4-3w, coaxed 2p 1/2p, 4-5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Johnstone Mile H. SARATOGA RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 98. Stakes Purse 125000. A HANDICAP FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 ea ch which should accompany the nomination; $625 to pass the entry box and an additional $625 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the publi cation of weights. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 29, 2023 w ith 11 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VENTI VALENTINE broke out and hit the gate soundly then bumped with a rival, saved ground on the first turn, settled off the rail on the backstretch, was roused while moving from the two path to the four path on the far turn then was driven five wide into the stretch, chased the leader into the final furlong, drifted out under a left-handed crop shortly thereafter, was placed under a strong hand-ride outside the sixteenth-pole, gained the advantage into the final sixteenth and prevailed under strong handling. TIMELESS JOURNEY traveled four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was asked three wide on the final turn, gained to make a bid at the five-sixteenths, took the lead in the four path into the stretch, drifted out between the eighth-pole and sixteenth-pole, was headed at the sixteenth-pole and missed while just able to get the place. BETSY BLUE went three wide between horses on the first turn, settled on the inside of a rival, dropped back some near the five-eighths, was roused outside the half-mile pole, went three to four wide for most of the far turn, paused slightly while moving to the five path late on that bend, came six wide into the stretch, chased outside while remaining on her inside lead into the final furlong, swapped to the proper lead at the sixteenth-pole and finished with good courage but missed while clear for the show. KNOW IT ALL AUDREY was hustled from the gate, prompted the pace on the outside of the leader in the two path, took the advantage approaching the seven-sixteenths, vied in the two path on the final turn, lost the advantage into upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. SUNSET LOUISE stumbled at the start then was bumped by a foe, moved up under urging on the inside to take the lead, showed the way while inside of an opponent down the backstretch, lost the advantage near the seven-sixteenths pole, vied along the rail under urging on the far turn, dropped back outside the quarter-pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Venti Valentine
ENTRY.OWNER: NY Final Furlong Racing Stable and Parkland Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,bmpd brk,ins1st,settld 2p,ask2nd,4w5/16,5w,rally,up1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,bmpd,hustled,ins pace,headed 7/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Know It All Audrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: hstld,2p1st,prmpt out,lead7/16,headed into lane,drop back1/8,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Betsy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled ins foe,drp back5/8,urged 3-5w2nd,6w1/4,gd courage

ENTRY.NAME: Timeless Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,settled outside,ask3w2nd,bid5/16,led4p3/16,drift out,caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORETHANAFEELING broke out at the start bumping MUGSY FURY, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five to six wide for home, dug in under a drive rallying outside and was up in the final jumps to prevail. REFUAH broke out at the start and was corrected, chased three then two wide in closest aim of the leader advancing to apply pressure before taking command five-sixteenths from home, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive fending off a pair of rivals, then got caught in the last jumps to the finish. UNION TRAIL chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, lugged in on the wrong lead a furlong out, then ran on to secure the show honors. LT. MITCHELL coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then two to three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and kept on to the finish. KID KREESA stumbled at the start, showed the way in hand along the inside under some pressure from REFUAH to the outside, yielded the front with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. IMPAZIBLE PRINCE got bumped at the start by Z DANCER, who broke outwards, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. Z DANCER broke out at the start bumping the aforementioned foe, chased five wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, cornered five to six wide into upper stretch and weakened. HERONEANDONLY chased just off the inside just off the pace early on, came under coaxing tipped three wide at the three-eighths, had the rider lose the handle on the crop to the right side with five-sixteenths remaining, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. MUGSY FURY got bumped at the start by MORETHANAFEELING, chased three wide until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Morethanafeeling
ENTRY.OWNER: Vintage Thoroughbreds LLC and Carguys Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w upper, up last jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Fury
ENTRY.OWNER: Furey III Charles and Davis Marguerite
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3w, to ins 1/2, coaxed 7/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Z Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 5w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Impazible Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Kreesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, in hand ins, yielded 5/16, ins 1/4, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2-3w 3/8, 3-4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Union Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, lugged in 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Heroneandonly
ENTRY.OWNER: Simeone Paul J Joyce Kevin DeVaney Randall and Cartier Cohen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3w 3/8, lost crop 5/16, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Refuah
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Walder Peter R
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, up 5/16, 3-4w upper, caught late
